shops.name: mango
shops.description: Mango is a tropical fruit known for its sweet, juicy taste. It comes in various colors and sizes and is rich in vitamins and antioxidants.

shops.name: apple
shops.description: Apples are crisp, sweet or tart fruits that come in different colors like red, green, and yellow. They're packed with fiber, vitamins, and antioxidants.

shops.name: watermelon
shops.description: Watermelon is a refreshing fruit with juicy, pink flesh and black seeds. It's hydrating, low in calories, and contains vitamins A and C, as well as antioxidants like lycopene.

shops.name: banana
shops.description: Banana is a curved, yellow fruit with a creamy texture and a sweet taste. It is rich in potassium, fiber, and vitamins, making it a nutritious snack.

shops.name: grape
shops.description: Grapes are small, round fruits that grow in clusters on vines. They come in various colors like green, red, and purple and are packed with antioxidants and vitamins.

shops.name: carrot
shops.description: Carrot is a crunchy, orange vegetable known for its sweet flavor. It is high in beta-carotene, fiber, and vitamins, making it beneficial for eye health and overall well-being.

shops.name: orange
shops.description: Orange is a citrus fruit with a bright orange peel and juicy flesh. It is rich in vitamin C, antioxidants, and fiber, supporting immune function and promoting skin health.
